body_html:
@steven-hh-ding Thanks for your help on this.
@ebrevdo I pushed new commits trying to address your feedback. Hopefully we are getting close.

In particular, I added more tests to check the reordering on elements with shape:

  • [batch_size, beam_width]
  • [batch_size, beam_width, s1]
  • [batch_size * beam_width, s1]
  • [batch_size, beam_width, s1, s2]

Reordering does not happen when the elements' shape cannot be inferred. Otherwise, it is check that they can be reshaped to [batch_size, beam_width, -1]. If not, an exception in raised suggesting to disable reorder_tensor_arrays.
body_text:
@steven-hh-ding Thanks for your help on this.
@ebrevdo I pushed new commits trying to address your feedback. Hopefully we are getting close.
In particular, I added more tests to check the reordering on elements with shape:

[batch_size, beam_width]
[batch_size, beam_width, s1]
[batch_size * beam_width, s1]
[batch_size, beam_width, s1, s2]

Reordering does not happen when the elements' shape cannot be inferred. Otherwise, it is check that they can be reshaped to [batch_size, beam_width, -1]. If not, an exception in raised suggesting to disable reorder_tensor_arrays.
body:
@steven-hh-ding Thanks for your help on this.
@ebrevdo I pushed new commits trying to address your feedback. Hopefully we are getting close.

In particular, I added more tests to check the reordering on elements with shape:

* `[batch_size, beam_width]`
* `[batch_size, beam_width, s1]`
* `[batch_size * beam_width, s1]`
* `[batch_size, beam_width, s1, s2]`

Reordering does not happen when the elements' shape cannot be inferred. Otherwise, it is check that they can be reshaped to `[batch_size, beam_width, -1]`. If not, an exception in raised suggesting to disable `reorder_tensor_arrays`.
